SEARCH
Package com.quantum.utils.logging

Class Logging

java.lang.Object
com.quantum.utils.logging.Logging
public class Logging extends Object
Provides a centralized logging utility with support for logging to both files and standard output.

The Logging class includes custom handlers for managing log files, as well as for printing logs to PrintStream or PrintWriter. The log files are named with a date suffix and are rolled over based on the date. Log messages are formatted with timestamps, class names, method names, log levels, and exceptions if any.

Use getLogger(Class) to obtain a logger instance that logs to files, or use getLogger(Class, PrintWriter) or getLogger(Class, PrintStream) to log to standard output or error streams.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
RAZANAKOLONA Erwan-Matthieu Liantsoa
